searchTerm.title: Search Term
searchTerm.description: The search term to use when searching Google Maps for dental practices

city.title: City
city.description: The city to filter results by (e.g., 'Springfield').

state.title: State
state.description: The two-letter state code to filter results by (e.g., 'VA').

location.title: Location (legacy, optional)
location.description: (Optional, legacy) City/State/Region (e.g., 'Springfield, VA'). Use 'city' and 'state' fields above for best results.

zipCodes.title: Zip Codes
zipCodes.description: Array of specific zip codes to search within

zipPrefixes.title: Zip Prefixes
zipPrefixes.description: 3-digit zip code prefixes that will generate full zip codes for searching

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Required array of keywords to search for in dental practice websites

maxResults.title: Max Results Per Location
maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return per location (1-500)

locationFilterStrictness.title: Location Filter Strictness
locationFilterStrictness.description: How strict should the address filtering be? (city, city+state, or city+state+zip)
